mapper.select: SELECT bs.*, bse.name as series_name FROM box_style bs LEFT JOIN box_series bse ON bs.series_id = bse.id
SELECT bs.*, bse.name as series_name FROM box_style bs LEFT JOIN box_series bse ON bs.series_id = bse.id WHERE bs.id = #{id}
SELECT s.*, bs.price as price FROM box_style s LEFT JOIN box_series bs ON s.series_id = bs.id WHERE s.series_id = #{seriesId} ORDER BY s.probability DESC
SELECT bs.*, bse.name as series_name FROM box_style bs LEFT JOIN box_series bse ON bs.series_id = bse.id WHERE bs.series_id = #{seriesId} AND bs.status = #{status}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO box_style (series_id, name, description, price, stock, probability, image_url, status) VALUES (#{series.id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{probability}, #{imageUrl}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE box_style SET series_id = #{series.id}, name = #{name}, description = #{description}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, probability = #{probability}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT bs.series_id, bse.name as series_name, COUNT(*) as draw_count FROM order_detail od JOIN box_style bs ON od.box_style_id = bs.id JOIN box_series bse ON bs.series_id = bse.id GROUP BY bs.series_id, bse.name ORDER BY draw_count DESC
SELECT bs.id, bs.name, COUNT(*) as sales_count FROM order_detail od JOIN box_style bs ON od.box_style_id = bs.id GROUP BY bs.id, bs.name ORDER BY sales_count DESC LIMIT 10
